content:
Action:1

I'm pushing left so that the avatar moves into the box at (2,5) and bounces it further left toward its target; I expect the avatar to advance into (2,5), setting up the next move.

Action:4

I'll move the avatar upward from (2,5) to start repositioning toward the box at (4,3), aiming to eventually get above it (at (3,3)) so I can push it downward into the hole at (6,3).

Action:1

I'm moving left from (1,5) to (1,4) to start heading toward (3,3), which is the ideal position to push the box at (4,3) downward toward the hole at (6,3).

Action:1

I'm moving left to head toward (1,3), positioning myself to eventually push the box at (4,3) downward into the hole at (6,3) as per the strategy.

``` Action:3 ```

I'm moving DOWN from (1,3) to reach a position (2,3) that will eventually allow me to push the box at (4,3) towards the hole at (6,3), aligning with our strategy.

Action:3

I’m moving my avatar one step down from (2,3) to (3,3) so I can later push the box at (4,3) toward the hole at (6,3), aligning with our strategy.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down to engage the box below at (4,3), expecting its bounce to carry it into the hole at (6,3) and remove it from the grid, which aligns with our win strategy.

Action:3

I'm choosing to move downward to push the box at (5,3) towards the hole at (6,3) and secure a point, in line with our planned strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (5,3) to (4,3) to get closer to the box at (2,4) and set up a proper angle for an effective push into a hole, aligning with our strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar upward from (4,3) to start approaching a good position (eventually reaching (3,4)) so I can push the box upward, then later maneuver it into the hole per our strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (3,3) to (2,3) to start a path that will eventually allow me to reach the right of the box so I can push it left—leading the box to land beneath the hole and then be pushed upward into the goal.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (2,3) to (3,3) so that I can later reposition to push the box upward—bringing it to (1,4) and then pushing it left into the hole at (1,3) for removal.

Action:2

I'm moving the avatar one step to the right from (3,3) to (3,4), positioning it directly below the box at (2,4) so that an upward push will send the box toward a nearby hole.

Action:1

I'm moving left from (3,4) to (3,3) to start repositioning around the box, so I can later reach the right side of it and then push it toward a hole.
Error: 504

Action:4

I’m moving up from (3,3) to (2,3) to position myself to the left of the box, so that I can later push it rightwards towards a favorable trajectory.

Action:4

I'm moving UP to reposition the avatar, which should take us onto the hole at (1,3) and let us later navigate around to push the box from the right side. This aligns with our strategy of approaching the box from the appropriate direction to guide it into a hole.

Action:2

I'm moving RIGHT from (1,3) to (1,4) to reposition behind the box, setting up for a future push from the right side that should help guide the box left toward the hole.

Action:2

I'm moving right to reposition from (1,4) to (1,5), so that I can later descend behind the box (at row2, col4) and push it left into the hole at (1,3) in accordance with our strategy.

``` Action:3 ```
I’m moving the avatar down from (1,5) to (2,5) to position it to the right of the box, so that a subsequent leftward push will bounce the box toward the hole—this aligns with the planned route.

Action:1

I'm pushing left so that my avatar bumps the box at (2,4) and sends it bouncing to the left; I expect this to start aligning the box toward one of the holes.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (2,4) to (3,4) so I can reposition behind the box (aiming for (3,3)) and then push it upward into the hole at (1,3), which aligns with our strategy.

Action:1

I'm moving left to position the avatar at (3,3) so that on the next move I can push the box upward into the hole at (1,3).

Action:4

I'm moving UP to push the box directly into the hole at (1,3), aligning with the strategy to clear the board. I expect that if the move only rotates the avatar, I'll need to repeat the UP action to actually push the box.
